1.name: Fort Apache
1.description: At Fort Apache, an honorable and veteran war captain finds conflict when his regime is placed under the command of a young, glory hungry lieutenant colonel with no respect for the local Indian tribe.

2.name: Red River
2.description: Dunson leads a cattle drive, the culmination of over 14 years of work, to its destination in Missouri. But his tyrannical behavior along the way causes a mutiny, led by his adopted son.

3.name: Rope
3.description: Two men attempt to prove they committed the perfect crime by hosting a dinner party after strangling their former classmate to death.

4.name: Ladri di biciclette
4.description: In post-war Italy, a working-class man's bicycle is stolen. He and his son set out to find it.

5.name: The Treasure of the Sierra Madre
5.description: Fred Dobbs and Bob Curtin, two Americans searching for work in Mexico, convince an old prospector to help them mine for gold in the Sierra Madre Mountains.

6.name: Key Largo
6.description: A man visits his war buddy's family hotel and finds a gangster running things. As a hurricane approaches, the two end up confronting each other.

7.name: The Red Shoes
7.description: A young ballet dancer is torn between the man she loves and her pursuit to become a prima ballerina.

8.name: Oliver Twist
8.description: An orphan named Oliver Twist meets a pickpocket on the streets of London. From there, he joins a household of boys who are trained to steal for their master.

9.name: The Winslow Boy
9.description: In pre-WWI England, a youngster is expelled from a naval academy over a petty theft, and his parents raise a political furor by demanding a trial.

10.name: Mr. Blandings Builds His Dream House
10.description: A man and his wife decide they can afford to have a house in the country built to their specifications. It's a lot more trouble than they think.

11.name: Hamlet
11.description: Prince Hamlet struggles over whether or not he should kill his uncle, whom he suspects has murdered his father, the former King.

12.name: Bud Abbott Lou Costello Meet Frankenstein
12.description: Two hapless freight handlers find themselves encountering Dracula, the Frankenstein Monster and the Wolf Man.

13.name: Against the Wind
13.description: British agents engage in hazardous duty behind German lines.

14.name: Romance on the High Seas
14.description: Romantic misunderstandings abound when spouses suspect each other of being unfaithful, and a nightclub singer takes a cruise under a false identity.

15.name: The Three Musketeers
15.description: D'Artagnan and his musketeer comrades thwart the plans of Royal Prime Minister Richelieu to usurp the King's power.

16.name: A Foreign Affair
16.description: In occupied Berlin, an army captain is torn between an ex-Nazi café singer and the U.S. congresswoman investigating her.

17.name: Quartet
17.description: Four of W. Somerset Maugham's short stories are brought to the screen with each introduced by the author. In the first story, "The Facts of Life", a young man with great potential on the ...                See full summary »

18.name: The Snake Pit
18.description: A detailed chronicle of a woman during her stay in a mental institution.

19.name: They Live by Night
19.description: An escaped convict, injured during a robbery, falls in love with the woman who nurses him back to health, but their relationship seems doomed from the beginning.

20.name: Snowbound
20.description: A group of people search for Nazi treasure hidden in the Alps. From "The Lonely Skier" by Hammond Innes.

21.name: Brighton Rock
21.description: Pinkie Brown is a small-town hoodlum whose gang runs a protection racket based at Brighton race course. When Pinkie murders a journalist called Fred Hale whom he believes is responsible for...                See full summary »

22.name: The Naked City
22.description: Two New York City detectives investigate the death of an attractive young woman. The apparent suicide turns out to be murder.

23.name: He Walked by Night
23.description: This film-noir piece, told in semi-documentary style, follows police on the hunt for a resourceful criminal who shoots and kills a cop.

24.name: Germania anno zero
24.description: A young German boy faces the problems of the tough life in the immediate post WWII Berlin.

25.name: Joan of Arc
25.description: The abbreviated life of the 15th Century French heroine.

26.name: Macbeth
26.description: Macbeth, the Thane of Glamis, receives a prophecy from a trio of witches that one day he will become King of Scotland. Consumed by ambition and spurred to action by his wife, Macbeth murders his king and takes the throne for himself.

27.name: Sorry, Wrong Number
27.description: While on the telephone, an invalid woman overhears what she thinks is a murder plot and attempts to prevent it.

28.name: The Big Clock
28.description: After murdering someone, a magazine tycoon tries to frame an unknown, innocent man for the murder instead, while the innocent man tries to solve the murder himself.

29.name: Superman
29.description: Superman comes to Earth as a child and grows up to be his home's first superhero with his first major challenge being to oppose The Spider Lady.

30.name: Portrait of Jennie
30.description: A mysterious girl inspires a struggling artist.

31.name: Anna Karenina
31.description: A married woman's affair with a dashing young officer has tragic results.

32.name: The Boy with Green Hair
32.description: This parable looks at public reaction when the hair of an American war orphan mysteriously turns green.

33.name: Easter Parade
33.description: A nightclub performer hires a naive chorus girl to become his new dance partner to make his former partner jealous and to prove he can make any partner a star.

34.name: Yoidore tenshi
34.description: A drunken doctor with a hot temper and a violence-prone gangster with tuberculosis form a quicksilver bond.

35.name: La terra trema
35.description: In rural Sicily, the fishermen live at the mercy of the greedy wholesalers. One family risks everything to buy their own boat and operate independently.

36.name: Mystery in Mexico
36.description: Insurance detective Steve Hastings is sent by his company to investigate the disappearance of a fellow agent. His first lead is the agent's fetching sister, Victoria, whom he trails to ...                See full summary »

37.name: 3 Godfathers
37.description: Three outlaws on the run find a dying woman in the desert who gives birth to a baby. The mother entrusts the care of the child to the three men.

38.name: Moonrise
38.description: Danny is being despised by his schoolmates because his father was accused to have killed another man and is condemned to the death penalty.

39.name: Yellow Sky
39.description: A pistol-packing tomboy and her grandfather discover a band of bank robbing bandits taking refuge in the neighboring ghost town.

40.name: The Pirate
40.description: A girl is engaged to the local richman, but meanwhile she has dreams about the legendary pirate Macoco. A traveling singer falls in love with her and to impress her he poses as the pirate.

41.name: Melody Time
41.description: An anthology of animated vignettes set to contemporary music.

42.name: The Velvet Touch
42.description: A Broadway star unintentionally kills her impresario but keeps mum about it when the police investigator targets a rival actress.

43.name: The Fallen Idol
43.description: A butler working in a foreign embassy in London falls under suspicion when his wife accidentally falls to her death, the only witness being an impressionable young boy.

44.name: Ladies of the Chorus
44.description: A chorus girl falls in love with a wealthy young man, but their relationship is jeopardized by her mother's fears about the reaction of his family.

45.name: Just William's Luck
45.description: William and "the Nites of the Square Table" haunt a house - the plan is complicated by fur rustlers.

46.name: Pitfall
46.description: Married insurance adjuster John Forbes falls for femme fatale Mona Stevens while her boyfriend is in jail and all suffer serious consequences as a result.

47.name: The Man from Colorado
47.description: At the end of the Civil War, two friends return home to Colorado and one of them has changed and is violent and erratic.

48.name: I Remember Mama
48.description: The ups and downs of a Norwegian immigrant family, circa 1910.

49.name: One Touch of Venus
49.description: Fantasy comedy about a young window dresser who kisses a statue of Venus, which then comes to life in the form of Ava Gardner. However, the problems begin when Venus falls in love with him.

50.name: Raw Deal
50.description: Joe Sullivan has taken the rap for Rick who double-crosses him with a flawed escape plan and other means intended to get rid of him.
